summary:
The youngest of the Senjua Sisters.
This Dark Brotherhood apprentice has traveled all the way to Skyrim in search of someone.
However, she also holds a secret. She is really...
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://s2.postimg.org/k7wbukduh/Information.jpg[/img]
Read her diary to find out more about her backstory!
I'm attempting to combine Naruto fan and TES lore. Thing are guaranteed to get crazy.
If you're a lore purist, I would advise closing this tab.

The youngest of the Senjua (Pronunciation: Sen-hwa) Sisters.
This mod adds a new standalone follower to Skyrim.
Reiko is a spellsword and a member of the Dark Brotherhood.
Reiko levels up with you, but also has a very large magicka pool.
Marriable.
[color=yellow]When you find her, she will be wearing a standard tavern dress, but when you recruit her, she will equip the black armor seen in the screenshots.
The white armor isn't allowed on the nexus, but you can google it. It's called the Sexy Jersey Armor, but is also known as Wjun lady.[/color]
_________________________________________________________________
[color=yellow][b]<-Perks->[/b][/color]
Juggernaut
Magic Resistance
Destruction Expert
Bladesman
Armsman
Conjuration
Twin Souls

[color=yellow][b]<-Spells (This mod will be updated with more custom spells)->[/b][/color]
Summon Kurama The II
Summon Reiko's Shadowclone
Reiko's Dimension - Teleports the player to Kurama's prison.
Reiko's Trust - Teleports Reiko to you from any location.
Frost Breath
Summon Susanoo
Reiko Demon Form (Reiko turns into a giant flaming wolf for 1 minute)
While in Demon Form:
Demon Blast
Frost Blast.

[color=yellow][b]<-New Weapons and Items->[/b][/color]
Katana of Frozen Souls - Deals frost and shock damage. May fill an empty soul gem
BlackHand Amulet - Grants the user several perks such as fortify illusion and muffle footsteps, to name a few.
The black armor is a combination of several armors (some retextured by me) used with permission from each armor mod creator. Do not upload it anywhere without their permission.
Reiko's Diary - Read it to find out about her lore
A few easter eggs - I would highly suggest taking a look around Reiko's house.

[color=yellow][b]<-Quests->[/b][/color]
As of 1.7, this follower now comes with a quest in order to obtain her services. This quest will be periodically updated.
________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://s2.postimg.org/o2v4je7mh/How_to_install.jpg[/img]
[color=yellow][b]FIRST TIME INSTALLING THIS MOD?[/b][/color]
Either use NMM to install it or drop the contents of the .rar into your data folder

[color=yellow][b]UPGRADING FROM A PREVIOUS VERSION?[/b][/color]
1. Start up skyrim
2. Dismiss Reiko
3. Fast travel to one of the holds
3. Save your game
4. Uninstall this mod.
5. Install the new version.
6. Load the 'clean' save
7. Enjoy this mod

If this is not done, the quest will behave incorrectly. I am not responsible for any damage done because you didn't follow instructions.


[img]http://s11.postimg.org/r9hmnrjnn/location.jpg[/img]
In her shack to the northwest of Falkreath. (Near a small flowing river and small waterfall)


__________________________________________________________________________________________
[img]http://s2.postimg.org/6oawb4ahl/recommended.jpg[/img]

I recommend using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037//?]Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url] and/or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524//?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url] with this follower.

__________________________________________________________________________________________
